title: 7636 S. South Shore Drive --Studio, 1 or 2 Bedroom Apartments
posting_body: ['7636 S. South Shore Drive is a Great Location!', 'This modern elevated building has a great location on South Shore Drive with public TRANSPORTATION and THE LAKE NEARBY.', '  It also provides FREE OFF STREET PARKING for tenants and use of LAUNDRY ROOM.', ' HEAT is also FREE.', ' TENANT pays ELECTRIC.', 'APARTMENTS includes MAJOR APPLIANCES -- REFRIGERATOR, STOVE,  and A/C UNIT.', ' BLINDS AND SMOKE DETECTOR also included.', ' Every apartment is CABLE READY.', 'COME VIEW our fantastic APARTMENTS.', 'Studio -- $700', '1 Bedroom Apartment -- $825-$850', '2 Bedroom -- $975', '$40 Non-Refundable Application Fee.', 'Studio and 1 Bedroom -- $350 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after Application approval --', 'No Security Deposit', '2 Bedroom -- $500 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after Application approval -- No security Deposit', 'If you would like to set up an appointment please call:', 'Kalabich Management at (708) 424-4216', '-Monday through Friday 9:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m', '-Saturdays from 9:00 a.m. until 12:00 noon. )', 'You can also check us out on Facebook, our website <URL>, or Twitter (@KalabichMgmt).']
